Body: I am using Lenovo A6000 Plus smartphone.I want to turn off all the animations. But in  Developer options there are only few options. The animation option is missing. I searched but I didn't find anything.Screenshot (click to enlarge)
Title: How to turn off animation in Lenovo A6000 Plus

history.Text: I am using Lenovo A6000 Plus smartphone.I want to turn all the animations off.But in my developers option their is only few options. The animation option is missing. I searched but I didn't found any thing.[![Here is the Screen shot][1]][1]  [1]: http://i.stack.imgur.com/hDKAb.png
How to turn off animation in Lenovo A6000Plus

I am using Lenovo A6000 Plus smartphone.I want to turn all the animations off.But in my developers option their is only few options. The animation option is missing. I searched but I didn't found any thing.[![Here is the Screen shot][1]][2]  Screenshot (click to enlarge)  [1]: http://i.stack.imgur.com/hDKAbm.png  [2]: http://i.stack.imgur.com/hDKAb.png
